meanings.definition: Resembling an urn in shape or appearance.
meanings.sent1: The vase had an urnlike design with a narrow neck and a rounded base.
meanings.sent2: The garden statue had an urnlike shape, adding a classical touch to the landscape.
meanings.sent3: The cookie jar, with its urnlike form, seemed to guard the sweet treats inside.
meanings.sent4: Her hair, piled on top of her head in an urnlike fashion, drew attention at the party.
meanings.sent5: The clouds in the sky took on an urnlike silhouette as the sun set behind them.

meanings.definition: Having the characteristics or qualities of an urn.
meanings.sent1: The ancient artifact had an urnlike pattern etched into its surface.
meanings.sent2: The ceremonial vase was adorned with intricate urnlike engravings.
meanings.sent3: The old teapot, with its urnlike handle, was a favorite among collectors.
meanings.sent4: His voice had an urnlike resonance that filled the room with warmth.
meanings.sent5: The tree's branches twisted in an urnlike manner, creating a unique canopy overhead.
